nodes.text: The Sith Temple on Thule was one of many that has existed throughout the galaxy, a constant reminder of the threat of the dark side of the Force. Built during the days of the Galactic Republic, when the Sith ruled high, the temple stood as a testament to their power in the center of Hurom.

Like most Sith structures, the temples seethed in the dark side of the Force; many of those who inhabited the temple put these dark energies to good use. One such inhabitant, a Prophet of the Dark Side, prophesized the occupation of Thule by the Separatists during the Clone Wars.
